work.name: Superprof.fi
work.summary: I am currently self-employed as tutor for the teaching of the italian language on superprof.fi. In the meanwhile, I am applying for PhD positions.

publications.name: DLRNA-BERTa: A transformer approach for RNA-drug binding affinity prediction
publications.summary: The paper involves the pretraining and fine-tuning of DLRNA-BERTa, a transformer model to predict SMILES to RNA binding affinity. Scaling laws and muTransformers are used.
